revised_title: Papers Read to the Society: January 18, 1900
tldr: This article presents a summary of papers read to the Royal Society of London on January 18, 1900. Topics include enamel development in osseous fish, nodules of leguminous plants, antagonistic muscles, the behavior of Becquerel and Röntgen rays in a magnetic field, and the thermo-dynamical properties of superheated steam.
